title: Malayan seashore
creator_credit: Tom Hodge and Malayan Film Unit
brief_description: The rich variety of delicate living organisms which abounds on the Malayan seashore, on sandy beaches, coral reefs and in mangrove swamps. The fascination lies in the various forms of sea life left by the receding tide and the strange creatures found above as well as below the surface.
